NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Soil Health and Export or the cell corresponding to Water Usage and Weather Impact?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Farm Management and Cost or the cell corresponding to Farm Management and Market Price?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Fisheries and Demand or the cell corresponding to Soil Health and Weather Impact?
